00037 class KviWindow;
00038 class KviModule;
00039 class KviModuleExtension;
00040 class KviModuleExtensionDescriptor;
00041 
00042 typedef struct _KviModuleExtensionAllocStructTag
00043 {
00044         KviModuleExtensionDescriptor * pDescriptor; // module extension that this alloc routine refers to
00045         KviWindow                    * pWindow;     // may be 0!
00046         KviPointerHashTable<QString,QVariant>              * pParams;     // parameter dict (may be 0!)
00047         void                         * pSpecial;    // special parameter passed to the alloc routine, may be 0
00048 } KviModuleExtensionAllocStruct;
00049 
00050 typedef KviModuleExtension * (*KviModuleExtensionAllocRoutine)(KviModuleExtensionAllocStruct *);
00051 
00052 class KVIRC_API KviModuleExtensionDescriptor
00053 {
00054         friend class KviModuleExtension;
00055         friend class KviModuleExtensionManager; // only the manager allocates and deallocates these structures
00056 protected:
00057         KviModuleExtensionDescriptor(KviModule * m,const KviCString &szType,const KviCString &szName,const QString &szVisibleName,KviModuleExtensionAllocRoutine r,const QPixmap &pix);
00058 public: // this has to be public because of QPtrList... but should be protected
00059         ~KviModuleExtensionDescriptor();
00060 private:
00061         int                              m_iId;            // unique id assigned at creation time
00062         KviCString                           m_szType;         // name of the service (toolbar, crypt engine...)
00063         KviCString                           m_szName;         // name of the extension
00064         QString                          m_szVisibleName;  // name that is VISIBLE and possibly translated
00065         KviCString                           m_szAuthor;       // Author (visible)
00066         KviCString                           m_szDescription;  // Description (visible!)
00067         int                              m_iFlags;         // Flags (0 if not applicable)
00068         QPixmap                        * m_pIcon;          // Icon (may be null!)
00069         KviModuleExtensionAllocRoutine   m_allocRoutine;
00070         KviPointerList<KviModuleExtension> * m_pObjectList;
00071 
00072         KviModule                      * m_pModule;        // module pointer
00073 public:
00074         // pParams ownership is NOT taken
00075         KviModuleExtension * allocate(KviWindow * pWnd = 0,KviPointerHashTable<QString,QVariant> * pParams = 0,void * pSpecial = 0);
00076 
00077         int id(){ return m_iId; };
00078         KviModule * module(){ return m_pModule; };
00079         const KviCString &type(){ return m_szType; };
00080         const KviCString &name(){ return m_szName; };
00081         const QString &visibleName(){ return m_szVisibleName; };
00082         const KviCString &author(){ return m_szAuthor; };
00083         const KviCString &description(){ return m_szDescription; };
00084         const QPixmap * icon(){ return m_pIcon; };
00085         int flags(){ return m_iFlags; };
00086 
00087         void setAuthor(const KviCString &szAuthor){ m_szAuthor = szAuthor; };
00088         void setDescription(const KviCString &szDescription){ m_szDescription = szDescription; };
00089         void setVisibleName(const KviCString &szVisibleName){ m_szVisibleName = szVisibleName; };
00090         void setFlags(int iFlags){ m_iFlags = iFlags; };
00091         void setIcon(const QPixmap &pix);
00092 
00093 protected:
00094         void registerObject(KviModuleExtension * e);
00095         void unregisterObject(KviModuleExtension * e);
00096 };

00098 typedef KviPointerList<KviModuleExtensionDescriptor> KviModuleExtensionDescriptorList;

00102 extern KVIRC_API KviModuleExtensionManager * g_pModuleExtensionManager;

00104 class KVIRC_API KviModuleExtensionManager
00105 {
00106         friend class KviModule;
00107         friend class KviApplication;
00108 protected:
00109         KviModuleExtensionManager(); // KviApplication calls this
00110         ~KviModuleExtensionManager(); // and this
00111 protected:
00112         KviPointerHashTable<const char *,KviModuleExtensionDescriptorList> * m_pExtensionDict;
00113 protected:
00114         // Only KviModule can call this
00115         KviModuleExtensionDescriptor * registerExtension(KviModule * m,const KviCString &szType,const KviCString &szName,const QString &szVisibleName,KviModuleExtensionAllocRoutine r,const QPixmap &icon);
00116         void unregisterExtensionsByModule(KviModule * m);
00117 public:
00118         KviModuleExtensionDescriptor * findExtensionDescriptor(const KviCString &szType,const KviCString &szName);
00119         static KviModuleExtensionManager * instance(){ return g_pModuleExtensionManager; };
00120         KviModuleExtensionDescriptorList * getExtensionList(const KviCString &szType);
00121         KviModuleExtension * allocateExtension(const KviCString &szType,const KviCString &szName,KviWindow * pWnd = 0,KviPointerHashTable<QString,QVariant> * pParams = 0,void * pSpecial = 0,const QString &preloadModule = QString());
00122         KviModuleExtension * allocateExtension(const KviCString &szType,int id,KviWindow * pWnd = 0,KviPointerHashTable<QString,QVariant> * pParams = 0,void * pSpecial = 0,const QString &preloadModule = QString());
00123 private:
00124         KviModuleExtensionDescriptorList * allocateExtensionGetDescriptorList(const KviCString &szType,const QString &preloadModule);
00125 };

00129 class KVIRC_API KviModuleExtension : public KviHeapObject
00130 {
00131 public:
00132         KviModuleExtension(KviModuleExtensionDescriptor * d);
00133         virtual ~KviModuleExtension();
00134 private:
00135         KviModuleExtensionDescriptor * m_pDescriptor;
00136 public:
00137         static KviModuleExtensionManager * manager(){ return g_pModuleExtensionManager; };
00138         KviModuleExtensionDescriptor * descriptor(){ return m_pDescriptor; };
00139         // A module extension MUST implement die() as "delete this" <-- FIXME: this should be no longer necessary with KviHeapObject
00140         virtual void die() = 0;
00141 };
